wikipedia_page.main: Iain Malone Luke (born 8 October 1951, Dundee) is a former Labour Party politician in Scotland. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Dundee East from 2001 until being unseated at the 2005 general election by Stewart Hosie of the Scottish National Party (SNP).
